job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>This is your dream position if you love providing actionable insights from sources like media buying platforms and customer journeys through the e-commerce cycle.</p><p><br></p><p>THIS IS POSITION FOR OUR OFFICE IN SALT LAKE CITY, UTAH.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><ul><li>Analyze raw data: assessing quality, cleansing, structuring for downstream processing</li><li>Collaborate with the media buyer team to bring analytical insights to the reality</li><li>Generate actionable insights for business improvements</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Qualifications</strong></p><ul><li>Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in a quantitative field (Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering, information systems.)</li><li>At least 1 - 2 years' of experience in analytics</li><li>Experience in gathering insights from google ads manager, Facebook, Shopify, Gemini, Acuity, taboola, etc.</li></ul>
